meanings.sent1: She walked lazily to the park, taking her time.
meanings.sent2: He often moves lazily on a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The cat yawned lazily, showing no interest in the noisy birds outside.
meanings.sent4: The clouds drifted lazily across the sky, like cotton candy in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The old dog slept lazily in the warm sun, dreaming of chasing rabbits.

meanings.sent1: He completed the task lazily, barely putting in any work.
meanings.sent2: She spoke lazily, her words slurred from tiredness.
meanings.sent3: The car engine rumbled lazily, struggling to start on the cold morning.
meanings.sent4: Time passed lazily, as if the clock had slowed down.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed lazily through the valley, carrying leaves with it.
